718648f.title: Manhattan: Charlton Street - Hudson Street
718648f.folder: Charlton Street & Hudson Street, Manhattan, NY

720523f-a.title: Manhattan: Hudson Street - Charlton Street
720523f-a.text:
Hudson Street at Charlton Street, seen from the oleared N.W.
corner, in the foreground, the block where the Standard Statistics
Building will rise.
April 23, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
720523f-a.folder: Hudson Street & Charlton Street, Manhattan, NY

720530f-a.title: Manhattan: Hudson Street - Charlton Street
720530f-a.folder: Hudson Street & Charlton Street, Manhattan, NY

720530f-b.title: Manhattan: Hudson Street - Charlton Street
720530f-b.folder: Hudson Street & Charlton Street, Manhattan, NY

718650f-a.title: Manhattan: Charlton Street - Hudson Street
718650f-a.text:
Charlton Street, south side, west Irom Hudson to Greenwich
Streets. In the foreground are several frame buildings (S. W.
corner of Hudson Street) which are absent in 1922 and their site
vacant according to Bromleys New York Atlas of that year. Note
the cobblestones and the horse car rails.
1G98
J. Corell
P. L. Sperr
NO REPR DUCTIO1IS
718650f-a.folder: Charlton Street & Hudson Street, Manhattan, NY

720528f-a.title: Manhattan: Hudson Street - Charlton Street
720528f-a.folder: Hudson Street & Charlton Street, Manhattan, NY

720527f-a.title: Manhattan: Hudson Street - Charlton Street
720527f-a.text:
Hudson Street, west side, from Charlton Street to King, showing
the excavation for the new Standard Statistics Building.
April 23,1930.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
720527f-a.folder: Hudson Street & Charlton Street, Manhattan, NY

718649f-a.title: Manhattan: Charlton Street - Hudson Street
718649f-a.text:
Charlton Street, north side, clearing west of Hudson Street,
looking across the future site of the Standard Statistics Building
to the houses on the north side of King Street.
April 23, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
718649f-a.folder: Charlton Street & Hudson Street, Manhattan, NY

718646f-a.title: Manhattan: Charlton Street - Hudson Street
718646f-a.text:
(1)
71 to 69 Charlton Street, north side, between Budson and Varick
Streets. The No. 69 half of the building is frame behind its brick
facing.
1912.
MAY BE REPRODUCED.
(2)
The same, a winter view. About 1926 these houses will be torn
down for the building of a garage.
About 1912.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
MAY BE REPRODUCED.
